attributes.review: absolutely awful! insane amount of glitches and would show insanely inappropriate ads. such a shame i was so excited about this app too. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. it’s a waste of storage and ever since i downloaded it my phone has been twenty times slower at least.
attributes.title: if i could leave less than a one star review i would

attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE. like wow I’ve never seen an app this bad.  When you first open it you see an orange. I thought I was getting this app for Trump 🍊. Anyways, why would you even want this app because Trump is not only a terrible person he is a terrible president. He needs to go back to running hotels... being president isn’t cut out for him.
attributes.title: 🍊🌝🤮🦊✨🧚‍♀️🤢👁👄👁

attributes.review:
1. It took so long for it to even register that I want to download it. 
2. It’s is terrible I tried putting in my phone number to get it started and stuff and it didn’t even load. Took two hours.
3. I can’t even figure out how the app works
4. It’s just all-around terrible and it’s just very very bad
attributes.title: Don’t download!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if trump was a worthy candidate for the election. Wanted to have an open mind before I voted. But I think it just made it worse. Right after I downloaded the app people kept on calling me. If they sold my number to telemarketers I will be dammed. Don’t download this app as it will do you the same thing.
attributes.title: My Phone Was Spammed

attributes.review: First, I downloaded the app and it took 5 hours and nearly half my space so I had to delete everything off my phone. Secondly, The app glitches to the point that my phone couldn't turn off or exit out to any apps. Would not recommend if you don't want your phone to act stupid.
attributes.title: Isn’t good😭😭

attributes.review: I was going about my day as most people do, when i felt a tad famished. I proceeded to my kitchen to retrieve myself a nice snack, some muffins. i was utterly SHOCKED to find that instead of my muffins being where i had left them on the counter, they had been place inside THE FREEZER. i am uphauled at this behavior hence leaving a disgusted 1 star review. I expected more from our PRESIDENT!
attributes.title: muffins in freezer

attributes.review: Well master , I mean pedo , I mean. Mr. president orange flake I just wanted you to know how truly disgusted I am by this app! I mean where is thePizzazz( jazz hands 👐🏽)And all the jokes you tell us on the daily I was really looks for a good laugh 😂 honestly?? Worst app ever !!! There’s not joy on this app and you forgot to add “ I am a pedo and a racist” to your slogan 🤷🏼‍♀️ . I WILL NOT USE THIS APP TILL THIS IS FIXED!! 🤬🤬
attributes.title: 👽👽BLM 🖤🖤  this app makes me brain cells die

attributes.review:
really tried to support our ra_ist (p or c) and 🍊 of a 🧚‍♂️prez🧚‍♂️ but he didn’t let me 🥺. I wanted to talk to him and have him come to celebrate our all countries matter rally for him. No response yet 😭😭. Anyways, the amount of fake news and bigotry caused my phone to glitch. It basically broke and now I had to restart it 😡😡
Do not recommend getting
attributes.title: don’t download

attributes.review: I so badly thought that this app would be really great. That it would make the App Store great again, but sadly 😞 it did not. This app is so horrible and it really just puts shame on all other apps. It takes forever to load and will just randomly turn my screen orange. I really wish it would have worked 😖

I knew I hated this app from the beginning and I still hate it. I’m glad people are beginning to realize how terrible this app is. For 4 years this app has been loading doing nothing, I recently tried to see if it would do something during the pandemic but yet again nothing.
attributes.title: Terrible
